SELECT u.`id`,u.`user_name` userName,u.`password`,u.`real_name` realName,u.`status`,sa.`name` fromSystem,open_id openId,u.`create_time` createTime,u.`update_time` updateTime FROM `sys_user` u LEFT JOIN sys_re_user_app ua ON ua.`user_id` = u.`id` LEFT JOIN sys_app sa ON sa.`id` = ua.`app_id`
u.`user_name` = #{userName}
